p: There was also no statistical difference in arenavirus prevalence (antigen or antibody) in age within M. natalensis. However, the presence of both PCR- and IgG-positive individuals in the youngest age class of M. natalensis in Ekpoma supports previous findings that LASV [ 41] and other arenaviruses such as Mopeia [ 42] are transmitted through both vertical and horizontal modes.
